comments.author: alwu@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Per [1], we should propagate the position state to the event source in order to show corresponding UI components, eg. media duration and current playback position. 

We want to have this in order to support GeckoView's `Delegate::onPositionState(PositionState state)` [2]

[1] https://w3c.github.io/mediasession/#position-state
[2] https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cv7dhLvf7HYr34qNP7SYBNCARBZ2HFbegRsK4PGZHZQ/edit
comments.creator: alwu@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Per [1], we should propagate the position state to the event source in order to show corresponding UI components, eg. media duration and current playback position. 

We want to have this in order to support GeckoView's `Delegate::onPositionState(PositionState state)` [2]

[1] https://w3c.github.io/mediasession/#position-state
[2] https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cv7dhLvf7HYr34qNP7SYBNCARBZ2HFbegRsK4PGZHZQ/edit

comments.raw_text: @alwu - Is this exposed to the web at all? It doesn't appear to be.
comments.author: the.sheppy@gmail.com
comments.text: @alwu - Is this exposed to the web at all? It doesn't appear to be.
No, this is for our internal usage. The one we expose to web developers is in bug1582509.
